alert.note: Alert for Del Norte Interior; Northern Humboldt Interior; Northern Trinity; Southern Trinity (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 04 at 10:01PM PST until March 05 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST SUNDAY ABOVE 500 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected above 500 feet. Total snow accumulations ranging from 4 inches near 500 feet to 17 inches across higher ridges. Snow may accumulate at elevations below 500 feet tonight into Sunday morning. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph on ridgetops. * WHERE...Del Norte Interior, Northern Humboldt Interior, Northern Trinity and Southern Trinity Counties. * WHEN...Until 4 PM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state of California can be obtained by calling 1-800-GAS-ROAD.

area.areaDesc: Del Norte Interior; Northern Humboldt Interior; Northern Trinity; Southern Trinity
